pronunciation.pinyin: chǐ yǒu suǒ duǎn , cùn yǒu suǒ cháng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: chi3 you3 suo3 duan3 , cun4 you3 suo3 chang2

meanings.value: for some things a foot may be too short, and for the other an inch will suffice (proverb)
fig. everyone has their strong and weak points
everything has its advantages and disadvantages
